thread.section_title: YesStyle.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of YesStyle.com | www.yesstyle.com | 7 of 620
thread.title: Megan

author: Megan
title: Megan
text: Yesstyle is a very good site to get good quality Asian style products such as fashion, beauty supplies, and lifestyle items so if you're missing things that you found more readily available in Asia it has a lot of popular items. It can be a hit or miss on some of the items and sometimes they run out of things even if they still have it on their website. Although the prices are also very reasonable depending on what you're buying. The international shipping is also a good perk. All in all though the products are really nice.
